title: Help - Shop does not load, I've tried everything! PLEASE! ~Just a black screen!
body:
Hello, For over a month now I've been unable to use the shop, it doesn't load whenever i try to open it i just get a black empty screen. 
I can't buy any new champions, skins or runes and have over 15,000 IP and i'm not even lvl 30 yet.

When i tried to buy skins from my summoner profile by preview champions instead of giving me a cost of IP and RP it just says "????".

I've tried fixing this problem several times over the course of a month and i've found dozens of threads of people having the same problem with nobody having ever received a solution.  

I've tried:
1. Restart your client
2. Check to make sure you have cookies enabled in your Internet Settings.
3. You need to have TLS 1.0 enabled, in Control Panel -> Internet Options -> Advanced tab, all the way at the bottom
4. Reset your internet explorer settings to default
5. Make sure you're not set to "Work Offline" mode in IE.
6. Update your Internet Explorer.
7. Reset your Windows Settings (http://kb.leagueoflegends.com/questions/45/Windows+Settings+Troubleshooting)
8. Reinstalling my client.
9. Syncing my clock.

I have up to date windows 7, all my software / firmware is also up to date, i have no antivirus and my security settings are always set to low. 

I knowticed today that if i log onto NA servers i'm able to use the shop, i'm just unable to use the shop on oceanic servers.

Please help me this problem is driving me mental i really want to buy some runes and skins for my champions.

replies.body: Same thing just started happening to me, but Riot won't respond. They don't care about the Oceanic server.
